dependencies: GitHub Actions (CI): hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3, actions/setup-python@v5, actions/setup-go@v5, step-security/harden-runner@v2, cisagov/setup-env-github-action@develop (from .github/workflows/build.yml)
deployment_relevant_files: README.md (Terraform module docs; references backend.tf, remote_states.tf)
architectural_resources: Terraform module: FreeIPA server cluster (3x EC2 instances) (from README.md TF docs: modules ipa0/ipa1/ipa2)
AWS IAM: policy and role policy attachment for provisioning FreeIPA (aws_iam_policy, aws_iam_role_policy_attachment) (from README.md TF docs)
AWS Route53: health checks and DNS records (A, PTR, SRV, TXT) (from README.md TF docs)
AWS Security Groups: server and client security groups + rules (from security_groups/README.md TF docs)
AWS S3 bucket for Terraform state (referenced in README.md; backend.tf mentioned but file not present in this workspace snapshot)
AWS DynamoDB table for Terraform state locking (referenced in README.md; backend.tf mentioned but file not present in this workspace snapshot)
Terraform remote state dependencies (referenced in README.md; remote_states.tf mentioned but file not present in this workspace snapshot)
AWS SSM Parameter Store parameters for CrowdStrike/Nessus configuration values (inputs in README.md TF docs)

dependencies: Terraform: aws provider ~> 4.9 (from security_groups/README.md TF docs)
architectural_resources: AWS Security Groups: client and server security groups (aws_security_group.*)
AWS Security Group Rules: ingress/egress rules for server/client (aws_security_group_rule.*)
